## AwaitedObject type

Transform a source object in an object where every AsyncTask is awaited.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AwaitedObject<T> = {
    [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends () => infer R ? Awaited<R> : T[K];
};
```
